enb_long_title: Thirty-fourth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
section_title: APPROVAL OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF THE 33RD SESSION
sentences: 2, Rev.1) was adopted on Friday morning with a minor editorial amendment.
Belgium noted the lack of reference in the meeting minutes to the Expert Meeting on Geoengineering and the participation of media representatives in at that meeting.
